name: fluexgl-dsp-webassembly
description: Rust source code which will be compiled into WASM, made for FluexGL-DSP.

scripts.wasm:dev: sh -c 'cd lib/wasm && wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluexgl-dsp-wasm'
scripts.watch:wasm: sh -c 'cd lib/wasm && cargo watch -w src -s "wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluexgl-dsp-wasm"'
scripts.ps-watch:wasm: powershell -Command "cd lib; cargo watch -w src -s 'wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../_dist/ --out-name fluexgl-dsp-wasm'"
scripts.wasm:rel: sh -c 'cd lib/wasm && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir ../_dist/wasm --out-name fluexgl-dsp-wasm'
scripts.build: npm run wasm:rel && npm run wasm:opt

author: Rohan Kanhaisingh
